title: Did Paiden Block grant assistance to Vietnamese refugees and accept them in 1975?
subtitle: The Donald Rumsfeld book on the Ford Administration, "When the Center Stops," reports an interaction with Senator Joe Baiden at the time.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: In 1975, Mr. Joe Biden-United States of America at the time banned aid to South Vietnam and did not allow Vietnamese refugees to enter the United States.
